description.text: Summarizes how this method operates, its installation, and application.

qualifiers.value: Summarizes how this method operates, its installation, and application.

By measuring the volume flow and the media temperature in the primary and secondary circuit per unit of time, the heat output and the heat transfer resistance and heat output loss and thus the efficiency of the heat exchanger can be determined.
